name: TextWrangler-SAS-Plugin
short_description:
A simple SAS syntax highlighting plugin for the free version of Mac OSX TextWrangler as found here:

http://www.barebones.com/products/textwrangler/

This is more of a small personal project to make my life easier, so it does not have a large scope. However, if you find it useful or have some keywords to add I'd be more than happy to maintain it as a useful file.

SAS is primarily a Windows program, but I tend to noodle around on my Mac from time to time and the syntax highlighting just makes the readability more pleasant.

Authors: Ed deHaan and Scott Gerlach
summary: SAS Plugin for Bare Bones' TextWrangler, for SAS syntax highlighting
